Job_Responsibilities:
Make outbound calls to potential customers
Present and upsell products or services
Record call outcomes and notes in CRM
Achieve weekly/monthly sales targets

Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns
Manage social media presence across platforms
Create and optimize paid advertising campaigns
Analyze campaign performance and ROI

Monitor inbound and outbound calls for quality
Score agent interactions based on QA metrics
Provide coaching feedback to agents
Identify trends in customer issues

Develop custom WordPress themes and plugins
Create and maintain e-commerce solutions using WooCommerce
Implement security best practices and optimizations
Build custom integrations and APIs

Analyze security alerts and escalate incidents
Monitor logs and event data
Investigate suspicious activity
Collaborate with IT teams for remediation

Maintain accurate financial records
Perform bank reconciliations
Process and record financial transactions
Assist with month-end closing procedures

Manage personal and professional schedules
Handle correspondence and communications
Organize personal and business tasks
Book travel and accommodation
